name: OpenCritic API
description: An API for accessing video game and video game review data

api_methods.name: Reviews for Game (legacy fix)
api_methods.description: Gets reviews for a specific Game ID. Uses /review/game/{id} for legacy support.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Sorts reviews based on one of the following:

- newest (newest reviews first, by publishedDate of the review)
- oldest (oldest reviews first, by publishedDate of the review)
- score-high (highest scoring reviews first, with unscored reviews last)
- score-low (lowest scoring reviews first, with unscored reviews last)
- popularity (based on publication popularity)
- blend (reviews within the last 3.5 days first; otherwise, sort by popularity)

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the latest reviews for the game 'The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild'?
I want to see the reviews for 'Super Mario Odyssey' sorted by the oldest first.
Get me the reviews for 'Red Dead Redemption 2' with the highest scores at the top.
What are the reviews for 'Cyberpunk 2077' sorted by the lowest scores?
Show me the most popular reviews for 'The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt'.
I'd like to see the reviews for 'Final Fantasy XV' sorted by blend.
Can you provide the reviews for 'Halo Infinite'?
Fetch the reviews for 'God of War' sorted by the newest.
I need the reviews for 'Assassin's Creed Valhalla' sorted by popularity.
Please get the reviews for 'Doom Eternal' sorted by score-high.

api_methods.description: Get game data

api_methods.name: /game/hall-of-fame
api_methods.description: Get the top 12 games on the OpenCritic Hall of Fame for the current year (usually changes in early February).

api_methods.name: General Search
api_methods.description: Search a combination of Outlet, Game, and Author by String

Find reviews from 'GameSpot'.
Search for content about 'Resident Evil'.

api_methods.name: All Outlet Profiles
api_methods.description: Get all Outlet profiles

api_methods.name: Game Search
api_methods.description: Searches OpenCritic for games with similar names/titles. Search results are based on inverse trigram distance, with 0 being a perfect match and 1 being no shared/overlapping trigrams. See the [pg_trgm](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/pgtrgm.html) library for more information.

utterances.utterance: Can you find reviews for the game 'The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild'?

parameters.criteria: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild

api_methods.name: /game/popular
api_methods.description: Gets the most popular games on OpenCritic, using a blend of page views, recent reviews, and the notoriety of publications that have reviewed it

utterances.utterance: Show me the most popular games right now.
What are the trending games on OpenCritic?
List the top games currently popular.
Can you tell me which games are getting the most attention?
I'm curious about the games that are popular at the moment.
Which games are currently the most talked about?
Give me a list of the most popular video games.
What are the games everyone is playing these days?
I'd like to know the top trending games.
Can you provide the list of popular games on OpenCritic?

api_methods.name: /game
api_methods.description: Query for searching game listings

parameters.name: platforms
parameters.description:
Platforms to search in a comma-separated list. Valid values are:

all,ps4,xb1,pc,wii-u,vita,switch,oculus,vive,psvr,3ds,xbsx,ps5,stadia,vive

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:

- newest (newest reviews first, by publishedDate of the review)
- oldest (oldest reviews first, by publishedDate of the review)
- score-high (highest scoring reviews first, with unscored reviews last)
- score-low (lowest scoring reviews first, with unscored reviews last)
- popularity (based on publication popularity)
- blend (reviews within the last 3.5 days first; otherwise, sort by popularity)
